Posted By: oraymw (11/7/2011 9:40:50 AM)

posts.post_content:
Of course blue is more used in drawing cards, but compare this one to artifact alternatives.  
Even the oldschool [Jayemdae Tome](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jayemdae Tome) only requires four mana (although you have to tap it, but regarding this enchantment, paying ten mana for two cards will only happen extremely rarely anyways)  
Paying five mana AND giving your opponent three life sounds rather ridiculous.  
  
Just look at the card.  
A *single* extra card requires you to pay {{8WWWWW}} and give your opponent 6 life.  
That's seriously not worth the card advantage, is it?
posts.html:

Paying five mana AND giving your opponent three life sounds rather ridiculous.

Just look at the card.
A single extra card requires you to pay {{8WWWWW}} and give your opponent 6 life.
That's seriously not worth the card advantage, is it?
